lines: NOW JUST A WORD FOR JESUS
1. Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu, Nakulorhi Lonene;
Leswi A Swendleke, Swi Tlhavula Mbilu.
2. Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu, Ri Ta Pfuna Ndlelen; Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu,
3. Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu; Ri Hlangula Vudyoho,
Hi Nsovo Wa Yesu, Hi Ta Fika Ekaya.
4. Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu; A Hi Nge Swi Tsandzeki;
Ndzi Rhandza Muferi, U Ndzi Nyika Vutomi.
5. Rito Ntsena Ha Yesu; Ri Pfuxa Ripfumelo,
Pfuka Ku Tsaneni, Tshika Hinkwaswo Ka Yesu.
